content.text: I am glad to make your acquaintance! how are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! how are you doing today?
I am doing well, too! I am excited to start a new life in Australia.
that is great! what made you decide to move to Australia?
I am a huge fan of horror movies, and I heard that Australia has some of the best horror movies in the world.
that is awesome! I love horror movies too, but I have not seen many Australian horror movies.
I would be happy to share some of my favorite Australian horror movies with you!
that would be great! I would love to watch them!
perfect! I will send you a list of my favorite Australian horror movies later today.
thank you so much! I can't wait to watch them!
you are welcome! I hope you enjoy them
